sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Welcome back. I'm Helena Humphrey. Let's check in now with some of the other stories making news at this hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Election campaigns often provide fertile ground for online misinformation to spread.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Sweden, this Sunday's election is going to be crucial, not just amid the war in Ukraine and the country's relations with its neighbor Russia, but also crucial when it comes to Sweden's climate policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Here in the Cube, we have found an example of online climate misinformation spreading in recent months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Now, this image claims to show two weather forecasts by the same broadcaster, one allegedly in 1986 and another from this summer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: People online are claiming that this is proof of so-called climate hysteria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They are accusing the broadcaster of changing and altering their graphics and colours to exaggerate the impacts of global warming. Here, online users are claiming that temperatures have not changed in Sweden since the 1980s. And the claim was even amplified online by an MP for the right-wing moderate party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But this claim is misleading.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Here in the Cube, we analysed those two images.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And we found that actually the first photo of a weather forecast was not from 1986.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It actually comes from 2016, as you can see the date here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This was shared by the state- broadcaster SVT showing the weather forecast for that day. And the second image is also not from this summer, it actually comes from last year 2021. This was by a different broadcaster TV4 showing the ground temperature forecasts for that day. So these images are actually just five years apart and they were shared by different broadcasters in Sweden who use different graphics and colors to display ground temperature and weather forecasts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Indeed journalists in Sweden say they have seen this same exact image being shared in previous summers particularly by online users who try to downplay or deny climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's something we've seen also spreading this summer in other European countries, such as France and the United Kingdom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But in Sweden, this is just another example about how online misinformation can spread during an election campaign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On a visit to Berlin, Israel President Isaac Herzog has called for closer relations between

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Germany and Israel to enhance commemoration of the Holocaust.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He was speaking during an address to the lower house of the German parliament, the Bundestag.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Herzog is in Germany for a series of commemorative events.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Only through the meeting, the deepening of relations and the persistent mutual commitment to freedom, to humanity, to democracy, along with an unwavering pledge of allegiance to the freedom and security of the State of Israel and the well-being of Jewish people, will both people ensure the significance of the commemoration, will they stand as an example for the whole of the commemoration, will they stand as an example for the whole of mankind." Later, Herzog visited the Holocaust Memorial in Berlin, accompanied by his German counterpart Frank-Walter Steinmeier, before traveling for another ceremony at the site of the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Today's visits come after both men marked the 50th anniversary of the massacre of Israeli athletes at the 1972 Munich Olympics, where Steinmeier apologized for the government's multiple failings. Уходи! Уходи! Уходи! The lack of obstetricians in public hospitals throughout Portugal has forced some maternity

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: hospitals to close permanently.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The task force president for emergency obstetrics and mother and child care doesn't see any other solution in the short term. The task force was created in June to tackle this crisis that is forcing pregnant women to travel much further to deliver their children. We've been working during the months of July and August on a reorganization of obstetrics and gynecology and neonatal care.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We think that this will probably affect the concentration of resources, that is, that some hospitals cannot keep their emergency and their delivery blocks open.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Some Portuguese hospitals had to close their obstetrics and gynecology emergencies several times this summer due to a lack of doctors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: During this crisis, two babies died and a pregnant woman died as well, while being transferred to another hospital due to the lack of vacancies in neonatology.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The deaths are being investigated. The Minister of Health has resigned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Being investigated, the Minister of Health has resigned. According to Diogo Aires de Campos, the National Health Service needs to be reinforced with around 200 specialists in obstetrics and gynecology.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the last few years, maternal mortality has increased in Portugal to its highest rate in 38 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Is this connected with the lack of doctors?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The problem doesn't seem to be the response. At least it's not evident that it has to do with the response. But it has to do with the increase in pregnancies of women who come from other countries, often countries with fewer economic resources, who decide to deliver in Portugal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Eichkampus also says that the report on maternal mortality underlines that there are now more women with diseases deciding to become pregnant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Tonight marks the return of the biggest club competition in European football, as some of the world's most prestigious teams ready themselves for the start of this year's UEFA Champions League.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Well, to preview the first night of action, I'm joined now by sports editor Andy Rubini. Andy, I mean, it is a great time of the year if you're a football fan, of course.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We've got games coming thick and fast. When it comes to tonight's action, what will you be watching out for?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: thick and fast. When it comes to tonight's action, what will you be watching out for?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Well, you've got some good fixtures coming up tonight. You have the defending champions, Real Madrid, travelling to Glasgow to face Celtic. Both teams have been in scintillating form so far. Celtic have won seven out of their seven opening games. Carlo Ancelotti's men also have had a perfect start. This one is interesting because the atmosphere at Celtic Park is electric and Real Madrid do take a couple of games to get into this competition that they've won so many times so this should be a good one also interesting to see how Borussia Dortmund will fare without their goal-scoring machine Erling Haaland this evening when they face Copenhagen. Haaland who joined Manchester City over the summer could be featuring tonight against Sevilla I'm saying could be because Pep Guardiola the manager likes to rotate his squad, and with the likes of Alvarez, Mahrez, Grealish, he might give the Norwegian striker a breather.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Having said this, the one game to watch this evening will be PSG against Juventus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Funnily enough, these teams haven't met each other since 1996.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: So much has changed since then.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: You have the Qataris Messi Neymar and Bappe all of these great players joining expect a star studded lineup this evening against a tough Juventus side have only conceded two goals so far this season but I'm pretty sure their defense will be put to the test this evening all right so certainly a high-stakes game will definitely want to watch but I do have to say ahead of tonight's game with PSG they're making headlines here in France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It's not for a footballing reason, I do have to say.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Tell us more about that, Andy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: For all the wrong reasons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Well, during the press, Kylian Mbappe and the PSG coach Galtier laughed off a question about why the team took a private jet rather than the train for a short trip to Nantes over the weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The whole thing was surreal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I thought the journalist asked a fair question.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Galtien and Bappe looked at each other, started giggling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The French coach then said he had anticipated this question, which made the answer even worse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He said, this morning we talked about it with the company which organises our trips and we're looking into travelling in sand yachts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's a bad joke, a terrible answer which caused a stir on social media. Ministers getting involved. You had the Paris mayor, Anne Hidalgo, tweeting, are you serious, responding like this. Wake up, guys. The French sports minister also saying that she was used to more relevant and responsible answers from the French manager. And I agree with her when it comes to responsibilities, whether they like it or not.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: These guys are role models and should lead by example.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In the French league, for example, you have teams like Rennes, Bordeaux, they travel by train.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In Serie A, most teams also travel by trains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This is a serious issue which wasn't taken seriously.
